name: 2025 11th International Conference on Computer Technology Applications
content: Publication: You are invited to submit manuscript to ICCTA 2025 Conference proceedings. Submitted papers will be peer-reviewed and evaluated based on originality, technical depth, research novelty, correctness, relevance to the conference, and readability. Accepted papers will be included into ICCTA 2025 International Conference Proceedings. Selected paper will be recommended and invited to publish an extended version on journal. Jousrnal of Advances in Information Technology - JAIT Indexing: ESCI (Web of Science, Impact Factor 2022: 1.0),Scopus (CiteScore 2022: 3.1), CNKI, etc.
organizers: FH JOANNEUM University of Applied Sciences, Austria
